direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle attribute management for tags with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods modify the allowed elements or attributes in the safelist, affecting the HTML sanitization process.
Both methods interact with the safelist's attribute management, though they serve different purposes (enforcement vs. removal).
Both methods involve removing attributes from the safelist, though one is for enforced attributes and the other for allowed attributes.
The removeAttributes method indirectly affects the outcome of isSafeAttribute by modifying the allowed attributes.
